d = {key: value for (key, value) in chain(d.items(), additional_dict.items())}
d = {keys[i]: values[i] for i in range(len(keys))}

for key in additional_dict.keys():
    d[key] = additional_dict.get(key, d.get(key, value))

for key in additional_dict:
    d[key] = additional_dict.get(key, value)
d = {k: additional_dict.get(k, default_value) for k in additional_dict}
d = {k: additional_dict.get(k, default_value) for k in additional_dict.keys()}

for (i, (key, value)) in enumerate(additional_dict.items()):
    d[key] = additional_dict.get(key, default_value) if key in additional_dict else value

for (i, key) in enumerate(additional_dict):
    d[key] = additional_dict.get(key, default_value)
